data.actual_result: It doesn't count towards the use frequency of the emote, although it's the case on Desktop.
data.expected_result: The emoji you reacted with should appear in Frequently Used (if relevant)
data.short_description: Unlike Desktop, adding an existing reaction to a message doesn't add the emoji you reacted with in Frequently Used list
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message with a reaction already added - Click on the reaction directly (do not open the Add Reaction menu, just click the reaction below the message) - Open the emoji picker
